Audio Stream.description: All meta info to describe the audio stream.

fields.name: codecName
fields.description: Name of the codec

fields.name: codecFullName
fields.description: Fullname of the codec

fields.name: profile
fields.description: Profile of audio codec

fields.name: timeBase
fields.description: Timebase for audio stream

fields.name: sampleFmt
fields.description: sample format of the audio stream

fields.name: sampleRate
fields.description: sample rate of the audio stream

fields.name: startPts
fields.description: start pts of the audio stream

fields.name: startTime
fields.description: start time of the audio stream

fields.name: duration
fields.description: duration of the audio stream

fields.name: bitrate
fields.description: bitrate of the audio stream

fields.name: framesCount
fields.description: frames count of the audio stream

fields.name: channel
fields.description: channel count of the audio stream

H264 Stream.description: Decoding and encoding paramters for h264 stream

fields.name: SPS
fields.description: Picture Parameter Set

fields.name: PPS
fields.description: Sequence Parameter Set

Key Frame.description: All Key frame info we need to split the video stream.

fields.name: index
fields.description: The index of this keyframe in all frames, including I, P, B frames

fields.name: time
fields.description: time offset of this keyframe

fields.name: offset
fields.description: The offset of this keyframe in the media file, use this to seek the file or do http byte-range download

fields.name: chunkSize
fields.description: size of this GOP (group of pictures)

Media Info.name: Media Info 1.0
Media Info.description: Content Pipeline Media Info 1.0. This is the *root* document object for the Mp4 & Mov MetaData.

fields.name: version
fields.description: Specifies the Media Info version being used.

fields.name: fileName
fields.description: Name of the media file.

fields.name: fileID
fields.description: ID of the media file.

fields.name: fileUrl
fields.description: The source url of the media file, including both audio and video, should be a http address in S3.

fields.name: audioUrl
fields.description: The source url of the media audio stream, including audio only, should be a http address in S3.

fields.name: fileSize
fields.description: Size of the original file.

fields.name: duration
fields.description: Duration of the whole media file.

fields.name: videos
fields.description:
A list of video streams.  
The order of the streams can be used to reflect on their order.

fields.name: audios
fields.description:
A list of audio streams.  
The order of the streams can be used to reflect on their order.

fields.name: subtitles
fields.description:
A list of subtitle streams.  
The order of the streams can be used to reflect on their order.

Subtitle Stream.description:
Allows adding meta data to a single tag that is used by the *Operation Object*.  
It is not mandatory to have a Tag Object per tag used there.

fields.name: name
fields.description: The name of the tag.

fields.name: description
fields.description: A short description for the tag.

fields.name: externalDocs
fields.description: Additional external documentation for this tag.

Video Stream.description: All meta info to describe the video stream.

fields.name: codecName
fields.description: Name of the codec

fields.name: codecFullName
fields.description: Fullname of the codec

fields.name: width
fields.description: Width of the video stream

fields.name: height
fields.description: Height of the video stream

fields.name: profile
fields.description: Profile of h264 codec

fields.name: timeBase
fields.description: Timebase for video stream

fields.name: hasBFrames
fields.description: Whether has b frames in the video stream

fields.name: pixFmt
fields.description: pixel format of the video stream

fields.name: startPts
fields.description: start pts of the video stream

fields.name: startTime
fields.description: start time of the video stream

fields.name: duration
fields.description: duration of the video stream

fields.name: bitrate
fields.description: bitrate of the video stream

fields.name: framesCount
fields.description: frames count of the video stream including I,P,B frames

fields.name: keyFrames
fields.description:
A list of key frames.  
The order of the streams can be used to reflect on their order.

fields.name: h264Stream
fields.description: h264 stream parameters
